current.currency-switcher-supported-currencies: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY

settings.title: 16oz Cans
settings.text: The TRíO was built specifically to fit your favorite 16oz beverage.  Our signature gasket design prevents any interference in your drinking experience - you won't even know its there. Perfect for Energy Drinks & Tall Boys!

settings.title: 12 oz Cans
settings.text:
Our included Arctic Adapter provides a perfect fit for 12oz Cans. It's filled with a proprietary freezing gel that will turn the TRíO into a mini freezer and keep your favorite 12oz beverage up to 5x colder than the leading competitor. In a 1 hour test the Arctic Adapter actually lowered the temperature of the test can -  just throw it in the freezer for 2-3 hours and you will have over 6 hours of cooling power on the go. 

(Bottles fit fine but they have some wiggle room. For an airtight fit, slip a neoprene koozie on the bottle and insert into the HOPSULATOR)

settings.title: Pint Glass
settings.text: Like drinking straight out of a glass? Bringing a growler along? Crack open a cold one or pour your favorite local brew straight into the TRíO and use our included lid for the perfect pint. Our triple-insulation will ensure you enjoy your favorite drink until the last drop and our high-grade stainless steel won't affect the taste of your brew or cocktail. It also works with coffee/tea and fits perfectly under your Keurig.

settings.title: Zero-Hassle Gasket Design
settings.text: Our unique interior threading gasket ensures that there is zero interference while drinking your favorite beverage unlike our competition.

settings.title: Impeccable Build Quality
settings.text: We used the absolute highest quality materials available while crafting the HOPSULATOR TRíO. From our kitchen grade 18/8 stainless steel and silicone to the copolyester lid and BPA-Free Powder Coat you can be sure that you are getting the best of the best.

settings.title: Multipurpose Drinking Tool
settings.text: The TRíO fits 16oz cans, 12oz cans, and can be used as a pint glass. No need to waste your money on multiple products or haul around a backpack full of accessories. No matter what you bring along for your adventure the TRíO has you covered.

settings.title: 5x Colder
settings.text: Our proprietary triple-insulation combined with our Arctic Adapter will keep your favorite beverage up to 5x colder than the leading competition.

settings.title: Coffee In the Morning. Beer at Night.
settings.text: The TRíO works with warm and cold beverages and fits perfectly underneath your Keurig!

settings.title: Non-Slip Pad
settings.text: Our high-grade, silicone non-slip pad ensures that your HOPSULATOR keeps a tight grip on any surface you set it on.

settings.title: Arctic Adapter
settings.text:
Our Arctic Adapter allows you to fit 12oz cans in the TRíO and is filled with a proprietary freezing gel that will keep your favorite beverage up to 5x colder than the leading competition. In a 1 hour test the TRíO actually lowered the temperature of the test beverage. 

(Bottles fit fine but they have some wiggle room. For an airtight fit, slip a neoprene koozie on the bottle and insert into the HOPSULATOR)

settings.title: Rugged Hand Grips
settings.text: Our rugged hand grips ensure you can keep a hold in slippery situations (they also look really cool).
